text: 15.54: Ais 25.8; Hi 2.14-15; VB 20.14Kha guigira mbarɨgi fhavi, nta harigi khesharav, nta wom mbarɨgɨrga fhu, nta zazera nzerara kɨrga. Kha vhɨzi fhavi, nta harigi khesharav, nta zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga. Mba tugen, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap suaŋgi kameŋ guigira hɨgɨrga. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme ntara mbuav, mba Vhɨzi tɨvar ŋkasŋka, ana guigira ana kambarigi.”
